dtos.name: Sociedades
dtos.from_sql: sociedades as sc left join sites as s on s.id = sc.id

dtos.name: Presbiterios
dtos.from_sql: presbiterios as p left join sites as s on s.id = p.id

dtos.name: Pessoas
dtos.from_sql: pessoas as p left join usuarios as u on u.id = p.id left join enderecos as e on e.id = p.id left join sites as s on s.id = p.id

dtos.name: Agendas
dtos.from_sql: agendas as a left join enderecos as e on e.id = a.id left join sites as s on s.id = a.id

dtos.name: Igrejas
dtos.from_sql: igrejas as ig left join enderecos as e on e.id = ig.id left join sites as s on s.id = ig.id

dtos.name: SupremoConciclio
dtos.from_sql: supremo_concilio as sc left join sites as s on s.id = sc.id

dtos.name: Secretarias
dtos.from_sql: secretarias as sec left join sites as s on s.id = sec.id

dtos.name: Ministerios
dtos.from_sql: ministerios as m left join sites as s on s.id = m.id

dtos.name: Sinodos
dtos.from_sql: sinodos as sn left join sites as s on s.id = sn.id

dtos.name: Nacionais
dtos.from_sql: nacionais as nc left join sites as s on s.id = nc.id

dtos.name: Sinodais
dtos.from_sql: sinodais as sn left join sites as s on s.id = sn.id

dtos.name: Federacoes
dtos.from_sql: federacoes as fd left join sites as s on s.id = fd.id
